building_cleaning.title: Building Facade Cleaning
building_cleaning.description: Advanced cleaning of glass and concrete facades, eliminating the need for scaffolding or manual labor.

solar_cleaning.title: Solar Panel Cleaning
solar_cleaning.description: Removing dirt and debris to improve the operational efficiency of solar panels by up to 30%.

bridge_cleaning.title: Bridge and Highway Cleaning
bridge_cleaning.description: Cleaning surfaces and sidewalls of bridges and highways using precision drone mounted spraying systems.

tank_cleaning.title: Large Water Tank Cleaning
tank_cleaning.description: Specialized cleaning solutions for hard to reach water tanks.

industrial_cleaning.title: Industrial Structure Cleaning
industrial_cleaning.description: Cleaning industrial structures such as cooling towers, silos, and metal infrastructure.

surface_cleaning.title: Billboard and Elevated Surface Cleaning
surface_cleaning.description: Efficient cleaning of high rise signage and billboards with drones.

About.title: About ALL Weather
About.subtitle: Leading the future of building maintenance with cutting-edge drone technology
About.description:
We work to provide quality and sustain the beauty and cleanliness of residential, commercial, and industrial facilities and facades.
Our drones deliver excellence through professional, high-precision cleaning, with a spotless finish free of stains on glass.

pilots.title: Impressive Quality
pilots.description: Higher quality and more impressive, better-looking results that ensure your building shines.

tech.title: Efficiency & Accessibility
tech.description: Reaching areas and angles that manual labor cannot easily access, saving 80% of cleaning time compared to scaffolding and lifts. We clean hotels, factories, buildings, and all facilities.

safety.title: Safety Assurance
safety.description: Significantly reduces the risks of working at height, ensuring the safety of both property and people.

Calendar.title: Book Your Service
Calendar.subtitle: Select a date for your cleaning appointment

intro.title: Excellence Starts Here
intro.description: At Bofahain, we believe quality starts with the right tools and the right people. We have invested in the latest technology and built a team of the nation's finest youth.

equipment.title: Latest Drone Technology
equipment.description: Our fleet of industrial drones represents the pinnacle of cleaning and inspection technology. Our equipment is characterized by high precision and operational efficiency, ensuring we reach the most difficult places safely and quickly.

water.title: Quality & Sustainability
water.description: We work to provide quality and sustain the beauty and cleanliness of residential, commercial, and industrial facilities and facades. Our drones deliver excellence through professional, high-precision cleaning, with a spotless finish free of stains on glass.

team.title: Professional Bahraini Crew
team.description: We are proud of our ambitious Bahraini crew. Our pilots and technicians are highly trained and certified to perform complex tasks with precision and professionalism. They are experts passionate about delivering the best.

Process.title: How We Work
Process.subtitle: Precise methodology to ensure highest quality and safety standards

assessment.title: Assessment
assessment.description: Comprehensive site inspection to define surface types and optimal cleaning materials.

safety.title: Safety Planning
safety.description: Mapping flight paths and establishing safety zones for secure operations.

cleaning.title: Cleaning Execution
cleaning.description: High-pressure washing using purified water to remove all impurities effectively.

report.title: Quality Check
report.description: Final inspection and delivery of detailed report to ensure full client satisfaction.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Answers to your questions about drone cleaning
FAQ.q1: Is drone cleaning safe for glass facades?
FAQ.a1: Yes, absolutely safe. We use calculated water pressure and Soft Wash techniques that leave no scratches, preserving the integrity and shine of the facades.
FAQ.q2: How is this different from traditional cleaning?
FAQ.a2: We save up to 80% of time, eliminate the need for expensive lifts, and ensure access to hard-to-reach areas safely.
FAQ.a3: Certainly. Our technology is ideal for solar panels and helps increase energy production efficiency by up to 30% by precisely removing dust.
